settings.caption: Premium materials - Hand Blown Glass & Genuine Bamboo Wood

settings.text:
Make your home feel magical and enchanting, with our Allure Aroma Diffuser.
The Pureairssentials Allure Aroma Diffuser will allow you to set any mood you desire with its vibrant colour selections including colour rotation of 7 different distinctive colours and a warm white light.

Made from very fine glass and a 100% genuine bamboo base, the Allure Aroma Diffuser is a delicate and beautiful item to have in your home.

settings.layercontent: Designed to withstand heat and humidity while also creating an aesthetic, decorative touch in your home.
Made from environmentally friendly bamboo which has natural antibacterial qualities to prevent bacteria and mould from growing.
Leave your diffuser on to turn the home into an aromatic heaven, then when the water runs out it automatically shuts off!
Just 100ml of scented liquid will have your home smelling aromatically for hours.

settings.title: Very Happy
settings.body: "I love the diffuser. I have had other ones that were OK. This one has a beautiful fine mist! The lavender oil has a lovely, soft smell. The diffuser automatically turns off when the water level drops which is a great safety feature. I would highly recommend this product."
settings.name: Vicki L

settings.title: Fantastic product
settings.body: "I am really pleased with this diffuser, I think it looks great in my home, unlike some high street diffusers you can buy from the shops which can look a bit ugly, I think this has a great design. I love the scent it really fills the whole room and creates a lovely relaxing atmosphere!"
settings.name: Becca K

settings.title: Beautiful
settings.body: "Well worth the money. Everybody that sees it - wants one."
settings.name: Jenny G

custom_css: .content_.first img {max-width: 400px; margin-inline: auto; object-fit: cover; width: 100%; height: auto;}

settings.title: Features & Benefits
settings.content:
• Made from Handblown Marbleized Glass with a Genuine Bamboo Base
  • 100ml Water Capacity
  • DC 24V adaptor (power cable)
  • Assortment of changing light colours
  • Automatically Shuts Off when water runs out
  • Can run for up to 12 hours at a time
  • Easy to clean
  • Works great with both scented and essential oils
  • Includes LED lights with 7 rotating colours available

settings.title: 1 Button Function
settings.content:
• Press 1 time = diffusing and colour rotating lights
  • Press 2 time = diffusing and select displayed colour
  • Press 3 times = diffusing and light off
  • Press 4 times = turn off completely

What's In The Box

  • 1x Pureairssentials 100ml Allure Diffuser
  • 1x Lavender Oil 10ml

Guarantee
settings.content: Try it in your own home for 120 nights risk free. If you are not 100% satisfied simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price.
